home.about-me: Based in Eastern Idaho; web dev since 2018; skilled in front end: React, JS.

positions.description: Contribute to team projects; re-factor shared components; learn new module/component design patterns.
Implement analytics site wide, including support for multiple teams; create shared React components; maintain and create new experiences.
Write unit tests for >= 70% coverage, re-write Polymer components into React.

projects.name: Trivia Speculation Game
projects.description: Back end with Node and sockets; frontend with React. Guess the answer to a question, bet on who is the most correct.

projects.name: Site-wide Analytics
projects.description: Re-factor analytics library in 2 different stacks; provide on-going support for bugs or features; used in 10+ apps, 30+ unique pages.

projects.name: Co-developer on Multiple Experiences
projects.description: Architect project and component structure; coordinate data input and REST API calls; unit tests, adaptive styling, i18n.
